greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(n, A064989(n)), where A064989 is fully multiplicative with a(2) = 1 and a(prime(k)) = prime(k-1) for odd primes.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A330749(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); gcd(n,factorback(f)); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 29 2019
